data.name: Revolve Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the official Revolve soundtrack by Arne "Evil Blue Koala" Goyvaerts.

Tracklist:
01 - Desolation Station.mp3
02 - Loop o'Bot.mp3
03 - Through The Rubble.mp3
04 - Contact Lost.mp3
05 - Aftermath.mp3
06 - The Great Outdoors.mp3
07 - Solitude Over Sanity.mp3
08 - It's Still Broken.mp3
09 - Spheres.mp3
10 - First Space Problems.mp3
11 - Galactic Meditation.mp3
12 - Stay Afloat.mp3
13 - Space Hums.mp3
14 - Variables.mp3
15 - Contact Found.mp3
16 - Gravity Isn't What
17 - End Credits.mp3
18 - The Foundry (trailer edit
19 - Get The Ball Rolling (
20 - Systems Switched On.mp3
21 - The Foundry.mp3
22 - Get The Ball Rolling.mp3
23 - Crafty.mp3

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Dutch, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Japanese, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 , Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia Videocard with at least 256MB, or Intel GMA 950 or newer
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770 or newer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVIDIA Videocard with at least 256MB or higher.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVIDIA Videocard with at least 512MB or higher.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.4
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+, GLSL 1.2+, 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
